title: Skinshards
body: Hi, is there anyway to get back a skin shard from hex-tech chest since I consumed the legendary skin shard for Annie in the Wonderland for rental. I didn't know this would consume the shard without confirmation after clicking . This was one day ago it would be great if I could get some help with this but it is understandable if it is not possible.

replies.body:
We can't [**refund hextech items**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) like skin shards since there is a confirmation step asking if you're sure you would like to use the shard as a rental. Also, the button you click says that it's a 7-day rental and also states it will consume the shard upon renting.
